Wool/agent.go.description: ValidationError pattern: struct with Field and Message strings, Error() returns "field: message", Validate() method returns *ValidationError or nil

Yarn/validation.go.description: ValidationError type created for Yarn package - struct with Field and Message strings, Error() method returns "field: message" format. Independent from but mirrors Wool/agent.go pattern.

Yarn/message.go.description: HiddenState.Validate() validates Vector non-empty, Layer >= 0, Shape consistency with Vector length, and DType in ValidDTypes (float32/float16). Nil HiddenState returns nil (valid). ValidDTypes is exported slice for dtype validation.

Yarn/message_test.go.description: Test file for Message and HiddenState validation. Uses Go table-driven tests pattern with t.Run() for subtests. Tests are comprehensive covering all validation rules for Message.Validate() and HiddenState.Validate(). Note: go test command not available in sandboxed environment - manual verification required.

Yarn/conversation.go.description: Participant.Validate() validates AgentID (required), Role (required), and JoinedAt (not zero). Returns *ValidationError or nil. Added after Conversation.Validate() method.

Yarn/conversation_test.go.description: Test file for Conversation and Participant validation. Uses Go table-driven tests pattern with t.Run() for subtests. Tests cover: Conversation.Validate() (valid cases, missing fields, time consistency, cascade message validation), Participant.Validate() (all required fields), NewConversation factory validation. Total 692 lines following message_test.go patterns.

Yarn/session.go.description: SessionConfig.Validate() validates MeasurementMode is valid if set. Empty MeasurementMode is allowed (treated as default). Uses MeasurementMode.IsValid() helper which returns true for passive/active/triggered.

Yarn/session_test.go.description: Test file for Session, SessionConfig, and MeasurementMode validation. Uses Go table-driven tests pattern with t.Run() for subtests. Tests cover: MeasurementMode.IsValid(), SessionConfig.Validate(), Session.Validate() (valid cases, missing fields, time consistency, cascade conversation/measurement validation to message level), NewSession factory validation, AddConversation/AddMeasurement state maintenance, Session.End() validation. Total 700+ lines following message_test.go patterns.

Yarn/measurement.go.description: BetaStatus.IsValid() returns true for optimal/monitor/concerning/critical/unknown via switch statement. Returns false for empty string or invalid values. Already committed in 5.1.

Yarn/measurement_test.go.description: Test file for Measurement and BetaStatus validation. Uses Go table-driven tests pattern with t.Run() for subtests. Tests cover: BetaStatus.IsValid(), Measurement.Validate() (valid cases, missing fields, invalid metrics, cascade hidden state validation), factory functions (NewMeasurement, NewMeasurementForTurn), ComputeBetaStatus(), IsBilateral(), SetSender/SetReceiver. Total 600+ lines following message_test.go patterns.

Yarn/validation_test.go.description: Integration test file for cascade validation. Contains comprehensive tests verifying: Session->Conversations->Messages cascade, Session->Measurements->HiddenState cascade, proper error context propagation with nested field paths (e.g., "conversations[0].messages[1].id"), nil handling at each level, factory function integration, and validation order precedence. Total 1268 lines of test code following Go table-driven test patterns.
